text: Ani untamadhye dona ani gayicya jatita dona. Tumhi sanga, kaya allahane donhi madyanna kinva donhi naranna harama kele ahe? Kinva tyala, jo donhi madyancya garbhasayata samila asela. Kaya tumhi tya veli hajara hote, jevha allahane yaca adesa dila? Maga tyahuna motha atyacari kona asela, jo allahavara khota aropa thevila, yasathi ki kasalyahi jnanavina lokanna margabhrasta karave. Nihsansaya, allaha atyacari lokanna marga dakhavita nahi
